verses.name: Song of Songs 6:1
verses.text: Whither is thy beloved gone, O thou fairest among women? whither is thy beloved turned aside? that we may seek him with thee.

verses.name: Song of Songs 6:2
verses.text: My beloved is gone down into his garden, to the beds of spices, to feed in the gardens, and to gather lilies.

verses.name: Song of Songs 6:3
verses.text: I am my beloved’s, and my beloved is mine: he feedeth among the lilies.

verses.name: Song of Songs 6:4
verses.text: Thou art beautiful, O my love, as Tirzah, comely as Jerusalem, terrible as an army with banners.

verses.name: Song of Songs 6:5
verses.text: Turn away thine eyes from me, for they have overcome me: thy hair is as a flock of goats that appear from Gilead.
